name: Just Energy Group
short_description: Just Energy Group Inc., through its subsidiaries, provides electricity and natural gas commodities in the United States, Canada, and internationally.
long_description: Just Energy Group Inc., through its subsidiaries, provides electricity and natural gas commodities in the United States, Canada, and internationally. It operates through Consumer Energy and Commercial Energy segments. The company offers longer-term price-protected, flat-bill, and variable rate product offerings. It also provides various products and services, such as LED lighting, smart building controls, monitoring and alerts, bill audits, smart thermostats, tariff analysis, energy insights, and energy procurement. The company serves residential and commercial customers through brokers, online marketing, retail and affinity relationships, and door-to-door. Just Energy Group Inc. was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Mississauga, Canada.
